usa.title: Plumbing Regulations Across the USA | State Guidelines
usa.description: Stay updated on plumbing codes, regulations, and installation requirements across different states in the USA. Find location-specific compliance information.

roof-types.title: Understanding Different Types of Plumbing Systems
roof-types.description: Explore various plumbing systems including water supply, drainage, vent stacks, and hot water systems. Find the right setup for your property.

roof-materials.title: Choose the Best Piping Materials for Your Plumbing
roof-materials.description: Compare plumbing materials like PVC, copper, PEX, and galvanized steel. Make informed decisions for your residential or commercial project.
